Random Walk Model
=================

Explore a simple mixed random walk model for the longitudinal data.

```{r}
for (fn in dir("../../R/", full.names=TRUE)) source(fn)

data <- ReadData("../../data/fvc.5.visits.csv")
data <- subset(data, select=c(PtID, year, fvc))
```

The likelihood of the patient's measurements conditioned on a variance parameter.

```{r}
ComputePatientLL <- function(df, cluster.var) {
    n <- nrow(df)
    cum.diff <- df$fvc[2:n] - df$fvc[1:(n-1)]
    dnorm(cum.diff, mean=0, sd=sqrt(cluster.var), log=TRUE)
}
```
